notes_text: Medical use of cannabis is possible with a special permit from the Food and Drugs Authority for use by individuals with serious or terminal illness.
notes: Medical use of cannabis is possible with a special permit from the Food and Drugs Authority for use by individuals with serious or terminal illness.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in the Philippines}} Medical use of cannabis is possible with a special permit from the Food and Drugs Authority for use by individuals with serious or terminal illness.<ref>{{cite news |last1=Viray |first1=Patricia Lourdes |title=Fact check: Is medical marijuana already allowed in the Philippines? |url=https://www.philstar.com/headlines/2018/12/18/1878036/fact-check-medical-marijuana-already-allowed-philippines |access-date=28 December 2018 |work=[[The Philippine Star]] |date=18 December 2018 |archive-date=20 December 2018 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181220091203/https://www.philstar.com/headlines/2018/12/18/1878036/fact-check-medical-marijuana-already-allowed-philippines |url-status=live }}</ref>
